siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Scheduling meetings is often a tradeoff between ensuring the meeting happens and protecting your focus time. Motion gives you the best of both worlds, finding the best times for internal and external meetings while increasing the chances the meeting happens.
blogPost.body: Scheduling meetings is often a tradeoff between ensuring the meeting happens and protecting your focus time. Motion gives you the best of both worlds, finding the best times for internal and external meetings while increasing the chances the meeting happens.
blogPost.title: Motion Scheduler - Reclaim an hour of deep work for every meeting scheduled
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 安排会议通常是在确保会议召开和保护您的焦点时间之间进行权衡。Motion让你两全其美，找到内部和外部会议的最佳时间，同时增加会议发生的机会。
localize.tagline: 为安排好的每个会议收回一小时的深入工作时间

localize.description: 安排會議通常是在確保會議召開和保護您的焦點時間之間進行權衡。Motion讓你兩全其美，找到內部和外部會議的最佳時間，同時增加會議發生的機會。
localize.tagline: 爲安排好的每個會議收回一小時的深入工作時間

previous.excerpt: No More Facebook lists privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products. Replace FB completely or use it less by trying these alternatives. Suggest a privacy-friendly alternative to help people depend less on one company.
previous.title: No More Facebook - Privacy-friendly alternatives to Facebook products ❤️

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook产品的隐私友好型替代品。通过尝试这些替代方案，完全替换FB或减少使用它。建议一个隐私友好的替代方案，帮助人们减少对一家公司的依赖。
localize.tagline: facebook产品的隐私友好替代方案❤️

localize.description: Facebook不再列出Facebook產品的隱私友好型替代品。通過嘗試這些替代方案，完全替換FB或減少使用它。建議一個隱私友好的替代方案，幫助人們減少對一家公司的依賴。
localize.tagline: facebook產品的隱私友好替代方案❤️

next.excerpt: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
next.title: Filma - High-end video editing on the go for iPhone, iPad and Mac

localize.description: Filma在这里简化了复杂的功能，为所有用户提供了从经验丰富的编辑到第一次业余爱好者的能力，能够以快速有效的方式创建强大的视频合成。⠀高级功能包括遮罩、关键帧设置或运动跟踪。
localize.tagline: 针对iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端视频随时随地编辑

localize.description: Filma在這裏簡化了複雜的功能，爲所有用戶提供了從經驗豐富的編輯到第一次業餘愛好者的能力，能夠以快速有效的方式創建強大的視頻合成。⠀高級功能包括遮罩、關鍵幀設置或運動跟蹤。
localize.tagline: 針對iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端視頻隨時隨地編輯
